scripts.test:api:dev: cross-env TEST_ENV=dev npx playwright test tests/api --project=API
scripts.test:chromium:dev: cross-env TEST_ENV=dev npx playwright test tests/ui --project=Chromium
scripts.test:chromium:dev:headed: cross-env TEST_ENV=dev npx playwright test tests/ui --project=Chromium --headed
scripts.test:firefox:dev: cross-env TEST_ENV=dev npx playwright test tests/ui --project=Firefox
scripts.test:firefox:dev:headed: cross-env TEST_ENV=dev npx playwright test tests/ui --project=Firefox --headed
scripts.test:webkit:dev: cross-env TEST_ENV=dev npx playwright test tests/ui --project=WebKit
scripts.test:webkit:dev:headed: cross-env TEST_ENV=dev npx playwright test tests/ui --project=WebKit --headed
scripts.test:api:test: cross-env TEST_ENV=test npx playwright test tests/api --project=API
scripts.test:chromium:test: cross-env TEST_ENV=test npx playwright test tests/ui --project=Chromium
scripts.test:chromium:test:headed: cross-env TEST_ENV=test npx playwright test tests/ui --project=Chromium --headed
scripts.test:firefox:test: cross-env TEST_ENV=test npx playwright test tests/ui --project=Firefox
scripts.test:firefox:test:headed: cross-env TEST_ENV=test npx playwright test tests/ui --project=Firefox --headed
scripts.test:webkit:test: cross-env TEST_ENV=test npx playwright test tests/ui --project=WebKit
scripts.test:webkit:test:headed: cross-env TEST_ENV=test npx playwright test tests/ui --project=WebKit --headed
scripts.precommit: npm run compile && npm run lint && npm run test
